channel.title: Coding A command [317]
channel.description:
[size=16pt]hello, im currently working on a 317 source and I've seen most sources have the command ::god That makes you fly.
Could someone Possibly make one for me...
Thanks ---icepkers[/size]

item.title: Coding A command [317]
item.dc:creator: @icepkers icepkers
item.description:
@icepkers wrote:

[quote=“Mercifies, post:4, topic:325309”]fivescape2200, you are going to get banned soon for flamming topics, spamming forums, and lanugage… It’s also not going to get you anywhere with help

here’s the code

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 2) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("god mode off"); setAnimation(760); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2010, 07:51:34 pm[/size][hr]you left out the godoff command could be a bad thing to leave out[/quote]

THANKS MAN!!! i’d ++rep thanks alot.

Read full topic

item.title: Coding A command [317]
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

fivescape2200, you are going to get banned soon for flamming topics, spamming forums, and lanugage… It’s also not going to get you anywhere with help

here’s the code

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 2) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("god mode off"); setAnimation(760); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2010, 07:51:34 pm[/size][hr]you left out the godoff command could be a bad thing to leave out
